name: Outwards
description:
In this game, you control a sleepy cube who wants to explore the world beyond its comfy little bed.

Manage your stamina, eat food to grow stronger, explore a procedurally generated world, try to make it as far as possible without collapsing, and you might just find a way out of this place.

This was a university project I made in my practical semester.

Note: There isn't a lot of variety in the world generation right now, so you will come across a lot of duplicate layouts. Will add more next week.

Tutorial icons by Freepik and Dave Grandy from flaticon.com
